mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_POST ( title, content, url, user_no, board_type, created_at, state ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{url}, #{user_no}, #{board_type}, str_to_date(#{created_at}, "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"), #{state} )
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, url, created_at FROM B_POST WHERE board_type = 'Notice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE B_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, url = #{url}, user_no = #{user_no}, board_type = #{board_type}, str_to_date(#{last_modified_at}, "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"), state = #{state} WHERE seq = #{noticeId};
